original: 武陵向艮坤而行，有一獸居於山中，首似龍，形如馬，狀比鹿，尾若牛，聲如雷。吾以為此乃古籍所言麒麟。
text: Wuling heads towards Gen Kun. There is a beast living in the mountains. Its head resembles a dragon, its shape resembles a horse, its shape resembles a deer, its tail resembles a cow, and its sound resembles thunder. I think this is the unicorn in ancient books.
